thread.section_title: Goway Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Goway Travel | goway.com
thread.title: John B
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by John B

author: John B
title: John B
text: Each segment of this trip to the Australian Outback took place as planned. Considering the trip involved several separate excursion groups and hotels, as well as two airlines, its success can be attributed to the professional organizational skills of Goway Travel. The trip was very enjoyable and educational and is highly recommended to those travellers who wish to have a unique cultural and topographical experience.
